result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Jeanette Kara Corbett for State.  State moves to dismiss and read in along with a plea to Ct. 1 in 14CF514 and Court so orders.

MH set 1-7-15 at 3:30pm removed from calendar per request of Atty Romanowich and consent of Court - def withdraws his motion; Case scheduled to be heard in Br 3 1-21-15 at 8:15am for possible global resolution.  If case does not resolve in Br 3, file shall be returned to Br 4 for scheduling purposes.
Notice of hearing - not deliverable as addressed

Motion hearing on January 7, 2015 at 03:30 pm.

Def in person & by Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Jeanette Kara Corbett appeared for State.  Clerk: CP. Counsel has filed motion to suppress.  Motion hearing scheduled for January 7, 2015 at 03:30 pm.
Defendant's Motion to Suppress Physical Evidence

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Sandra Jo Giernoth for State.  Clerk: CP.  Evidence has been sent to Crime Lab (expect results end of October/early November); counsel anticipates filing suppression motion and req adj to allow time to locate a witness.  Def currently in custody due to hold.  If counsel is filing motion, it should be filed prior to next hearing.  Hearing scheduled for November 12, 2014 at 01:15 pm.

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Katherine Romanowich.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson for State.  Clerk: CP.  Counsel's first appearance; adj requested.  Def currently on probation hold.  Hearing scheduled for September 10, 2014 at 01:15 pm.
Not possess any controlled substance without valid prescription

Def appears in custody & w/Atty Katherine Romanowich of State Public Defenders Office.  Atty Stephanie L Hanson for State.  Clerk: CP  Def given complaint, advised of charges, penalties and rights, and probable cause found.  Items will be sent to Crime Lab.  Atty Romanowich will represent.  Court sets $500 signature bond.  Hearing scheduled for August 25, 2014 at 09:45 am.
